meanings.sent1: The encephalitogenic virus spread quickly through the community.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying the encephalitogenic properties of certain chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The encephalitogenic mosquito had a tiny top hat and monocle.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like encephalitogenic arrows, piercing through his defenses.
meanings.sent5: The encephalitogenic storm of controversy divided the town into two camps.

meanings.definition: A substance or agent that induces encephalitis.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are working on a vaccine to target the encephalitogenic.
meanings.sent2: The encephalitogenic was found in the water supply.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous encephalitogenic played pranks on the other molecules.
meanings.sent4: His words were an encephalitogenic trigger, causing chaos in the lab.
meanings.sent5: The encephalitogenic was like a silent assassin, striking without warning.
